alert.note: Alert for Mahaska; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 05 at 6:40PM CST until March 05 at 7:15PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northern Wapello County in southeastern Iowa... Southeastern Mahaska County in south central Iowa... * Until 715 PM CST. * At 640 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles southwest of Ottumwa Industrial Airport, or 8 miles west of Ottumwa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Ottumwa and Ottumwa Industrial Airport around 650 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
